title: How to Make Orange and Pumpkin Pasta Sauce

steps.headline: Peel and cut the pumpkin to large chunks.
steps.description: Cook in boiling water until tender.

steps.headline: Chop the onion finely and crush the garlic.
Heat the butter or oil in a frying pan over low heat.
steps.description: Fry the garlic and onion until translucent and soft but not browned.

steps.headline: Add the mashed pumpkin to the fried mixture.
steps.description: Combine well. Add the orange juice and rind and lemon juice and stir in well.

steps.headline: Tear the basil leaves into small pieces and add to the sauce.
Serve.
steps.description: This sauce goes well with stuffed cheese or vegetable pasta. Add garnishes of citrus zest or basil leaves.

text: Peel and cut the pumpkin to large chunks. Cook in boiling water until tender. Drain pumpkin and mash well. If preferred, you can purée. Chop the onion finely and crush the garlic.  Heat the butter or oil in a frying pan over low heat. Fry the garlic and onion until translucent and soft but not browned. Add the mashed pumpkin to the fried mixture. Combine well. Add the orange juice and rind and lemon juice and stir in well. Tear the basil leaves into small pieces and add to the sauce.  Season the sauce to taste.  Serve. This sauce goes well with stuffed cheese or vegetable pasta. Add garnishes of citrus zest or basil leaves. Finished.
